author: MB
text: Ordered Celine sunglasses. Within 12 hours they were significantly less expensive. It was pulling teeth to get the discount. They were shipped and stolen before being delivered. I had to file a claim through UPS. The entire experience was awful and I never got any sunglasses.
title: Ordered Celine sunglasses

author: customer
text: My order took over three weeks to arrive after 3 phone calls. I was refunded the shipping charges, but the experience was very frustrating. The articles I bought were very nice, but I’m not sure it was worth the aggravation.
title: My order took over three weeks to…

author: Dissapointed
text: I had consigned a number of expensive designer items just to learn that half were priced wrong and mislabeled. They were sold like that getting me less than 15% of actual value. Dealing with consignor relations afterward has been a nightmare. And I have mot received any money to date
title: I had consigned a number of expensive…

author: Nancy
text: My experience has been hit or miss. The last two orders were exceptionally poor. I ordered a pair of earrings which arrived with bent posts and in less than described condition. Yesterday I received a Louis Vuitton bag that only mentioned faint scratches on the hardware. They priced it nearly $500 above retail but being a discontinued bag I was willing to pay the premium. It has much more wear than described including a large stain on the leather strap. It was cleverly hidden in the photos. The icing on the cake was that they sent it with no signature required. I am fortunate enough to live in a building with a concierge who accepts all packages. As I paid nearly $2k it gives me pause. It’s likely this will be my last purchase.
title: My experience has been hit or miss

author: customer
text:
Mistakes happen, so I  wasn’t angry about the error in the listing. My grievances are with the process of returning the item. I was told that I was responsible for shipping and I had to send proof of the error in the listing (photos of the shoe size)
I was only offered a full refund, after I insisted on full reimbursement.
title: Return Process

text: I was sent the wrong product and when I contacted customer service she answered no question and told me someone would contact me about it and I haven’t heard anything back.
title: I was sent the wrong product

author: Natalya Babiy
text: I bought a expensive Chanel classic flap and they described it as excellent. No signs of wear. When I got it , there was scratches inside and outside . And the hardware was sooooooooooo scratched up in the FRONT! Also, there was a no return policy on that…. When I emailed them, they ghosted me….
title: Lied about condition of item, & no returns allowed

author: RH
text: Your description are lacking and your pictures lack contrast and detail especially on black clothing. It is hard to see important things like what king of waist band and details of clothing. Have purchased items with details I don't like multiple times, even after attempting to zoom into pictures. You need to adjust contrast on black clothing
title: Your description are lacking and your…

author: customer
text: Products should be cleaned before they are sold. Every time I've purchased an item I had to take it to have it cleaned - bags + sunglasses, everything. I love the items but they should be cleaned before selling!
title: Products should be cleaned before they…

author: DocOlie Magno
text: Quite disappointed with the Chanel bag I purchased. It was described as in very good condition with minor marks and discoloration. Discoloration is not minor . If it was shown in the picture I wouldn’t have bought it. Also the dust bag is too small , it was not for that particular bag.
title: Quite disappointed with the Chanel bag…

author: Vivian
text: Shoes arrived not in a box but instead wrapped in tissue paper and in a plastic bag so they were slightly damaged.. Disappointing..
